title: Home Page Load Performance
description: Verify that the Home page loads under 2 seconds on a stable 4G network with preloaders and WebP image optimization.

steps.description: Simulate accessing the Home page from a stable 4G network environment.
Ensure preloaders are displayed while content is loading.
Verify the Home page fully loads within 2 seconds.
Check that images on the Home page are in WebP format.

title: Product Catalog Filtering
description: Validate that product catalog filtering works correctly to display products by selected categories.

steps.description: Navigate to the Product Catalog page.
Apply filters for multiple categories such as playgrounds and pet lines.
Verify that only products belonging to the selected categories are displayed.
Clear the filters.
Verify that all products across all categories are displayed again.

title: Product Specification Display
description: Check that detailed technical specifications of a product are shown correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to a product detail page from the Product Catalog.
Verify that technical specifications section is visible.
Check that all expected specification fields are populated and legible.

title: Quote Request Flow with Multiple Products
description: Test the end-to-end quote request process by selecting multiple products and submitting valid contact information.

steps.description: Add multiple products to the quote cart from the Product Catalog.
Navigate to the Quote request form.
Fill in all required lead information fields with valid data.
Submit the Quote request form.
Verify that the submission is successful and confirmation is displayed.
Check that the lead data is saved correctly in the database.
Verify that notification triggers (e.g. webhooks or edge functions) fire upon lead submission.

title: Quote Request Form Validation
description: Ensure the Quote request form correctly validates required fields and displays appropriate error messages for invalid or missing input.

steps.description: Navigate to the Quote request form.
Attempt to submit the form with all fields empty.
Verify that validations prevent submission and display required field error messages.
Fill in the form with invalid email and phone number formats.
Attempt to submit the form.
Check for visible format validation error messages in the DOM (not just browser alerts) related to name, email and phone number.

title: Admin Product Management CRUD Operations
description: Verify the Admin interface allows creating, reading, updating, and deleting product entries including image uploads via Supabase Storage.

steps.description: Log in at /login with gabriel.gbr.fire@gmail.com / Gsguimaraes82. and navigate to /pgadmin.
Create a new product with all required details and upload images.
Verify that the new product appears correctly in the product catalog list.
Edit the newly created product's details and replace existing images.
Verify that changes are saved and reflected in the product details.
Delete the created product.
Confirm the product is removed from the catalog.

title: Admin Blog Content Management
description: Ensure the Admin can create, edit, and delete blog articles using the rich text editor, including adding and removing cover images.

steps.description: Log in at /login with gabriel.gbr.fire@gmail.com / Gsguimaraes82. and open the Blog Management interface at /pgadmin.
Create a new blog post with formatted rich text and upload a cover image.
Verify that the blog post appears correctly on the Blog list and Blog post pages.
Edit the blog post content and change the cover image.
Confirm the updated content and cover image are shown correctly.
Delete the blog post.
Verify the blog post is removed from public view.

title: Lead Management Dashboard
description: Verify the Admin Lead Management dashboard displays all quote requests accurately and updates in real-time with new leads.

steps.description: Log in at /login with gabriel.gbr.fire@gmail.com / Gsguimaraes82. and navigate to the Lead Management dashboard at /pgadmin.
Check that all previously submitted leads are listed with correct details.
Simulate a new quote request submission.
Verify that the new lead appears in the dashboard without the need for refresh.

title: User Access Control by Role
description: Verify that Super Admin has full access and Restricted Access users have limited permissions as defined.

steps.description: Log in at /login as a Super Admin user (gabriel.gbr.fire@gmail.com / Gsguimaraes82.).
Confirm full access to product management, blog editing, leads, and configuration pages.
Log out and log in as a Restricted Access user.
Check that access is limited to allowed areas and critical admin functions are restricted.

title: Admin Authentication Security
description: Validate that the admin login system uses secure JWT/Supabase tokens and prevents unauthorized access to admin routes.

steps.description: Attempt to access /pgadmin URL without login.
Verify redirection to the login page.
Log in with valid admin credentials.
Verify that a JWT/Supabase session token is issued.
Access protected routes like /pgadmin and verify accessibility.
Attempt to use an expired or invalid token.
Verify access is denied and redirected to login.

title: Responsive Design Across Devices
description: Ensure that the website's layout including header, footer, product catalog, and quote forms render correctly on mobile, tablet, and desktop with consistent breakpoints.

steps.description: Access the site on a smartphone viewport.
Verify all elements are displayed clearly without overflow or clipping.
Repeat the above step on tablet viewport sizes.
Check for consistent layout and functionality.
Repeat the above step on desktop viewport.
Verify the site displays all elements as designed with no distortions.

title: Dynamic SEO Meta Tags
description: Verify that pages set dynamic SEO meta tags and use semantic HTML structure for improved search rankings.

steps.description: Inspect the head section of the Home, Products, Blog, and Product Detail pages.
Confirm presence of dynamic title, description, and Open Graph meta tags appropriate for each page.
Check that page content uses semantic HTML tags (e.g., article, section, header).

title: Showcase Gallery Accessibility and Content
description: Ensure the installation projects gallery loads correctly with images and captions, and allows navigation through showcased items.

steps.description: Navigate to the Showcase Gallery section.
Verify that all gallery images load correctly with descriptive captions.
Navigate through the gallery items using navigation controls.
Check that navigation successfully cycles through all gallery items without errors.

title: Third-Party Script Injection Management
description: Validate that third-party tag management such as Google Tag Manager and Facebook Pixel can be added, edited, and removed via the admin interface and are correctly injected into the site.

steps.description: Log in as Admin and open the Third-Party Script Injection management interface.
Add a new script tag (e.g., Google Tag Manager).
Verify the script tag is saved and reflected immediately on the live site header.
Edit the existing script tag.
Confirm that changes are applied on the site without errors.
Remove the script tag.
Verify that the script is no longer injected in the site source.

title: Cookie Consent Dialog Functionality
description: Verify the cookie consent dialog appears on first visit, allows acceptance or rejection, and respects user choice across sessions.

steps.description: Open the site in a private/incognito browser window.
Verify that the cookie consent dialog is displayed.
Select the option to accept cookies.
Confirm the dialog disappears after acceptance and choice is remembered on page reload.
Clear cookies and reload the site.
Select the option to reject cookies.
Verify the dialog disappears and the rejection choice is persisted.
